name: A Better Browser
description: Warns users with a simple message at the top of your website if their browser version is too old.

details.Language: Afrikaans, Arabic, Bengali, Chinese, Czech, Danish, Dutch, English, Finnish, French, German, Hebrew, Hungarian, Icelandic, Indonesian, Irish, Italian, Japanese, Latvian, Norwegian bokmål, Persian, Polish, Portuguese, Romanian, Russian, Serbian, Slovak, Slovene, Spanish, Swedish, Traditional Chinese, Turkish, Vietnamese

interface.name: Internet Explorer
interface.description: Highest version of IE to display warning (Setting this to 7.0 will display warning in IE7 and lower, but not in IE8)

interface.name: Firefox
interface.description: Highest version of Mozilla Firefox to display warning (for example 3.6; default is 0, meaning no check)

interface.name: Google Chrome
interface.description: Highest version of Google Chrome to display warning (for example 30; default is 0, meaning no check)

interface.name: Opera
interface.description: Highest version of Opera to display warning (for example 15.0; default is 0, meaning no check)

interface.name: Safari
interface.description: Highest version of Safari to display warning (for example 6.0; default is 0, meaning no check)
